text:
Hey folks!

First time importing a WordPress blog to HubSpot. Has anyone ever successfully imported user comments?

I have everything else transferred across but I cannot figure out how to do this. Tried all the different import methods (XML file upload, WordPress connect, Smart copy) but none of these seem to import them.

Saw a <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1554291169037800|discussion> from 3+ years ago about using the API but this (still) doesn’t allow you to set the `createdAt` date, so importing like this would not retain the original dates of each comment. Would be super grateful for any ideas or workarounds people might have used. Thanks!

As far as I know, there's no real way to import a WordPress theme to HubSpot. You’d need to manually recreate the theme using the HubSpot Design Tools.

You could start by cloning one of the free themes in HubSpot that's a close enough match to your WordPress theme layout and then customizing it.
